name: ergometer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of equipment that measures the effort or energy that someone uses while performing a particular action: Patients performed progressive exercise on a semi-upright bicycle ergometer. Tests of cardiopulmonary function can be carried out using an arm ergometer.
(abbreviation erg) a piece of exercise equipment that copies the actions of rowing a boat and measures the effort or energy that someone uses while doing this: In training, she spends as much time on the ergometer as she does on the river. For rowing without getting wet and cold, you need a machine called an ergometer. Compare
rowing machine
